statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -5 \\ -5 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 9 \\ 14 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -21 \\ -41 \\ 20 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -5 \\ -5 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 9 \\ 14 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -21 \\ -41 \\ 20 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
